content.label: I loved it so much I beat it In 3 days
Addicted to game

Well thought out game that starts off with easy puzzles and slowly introduces you to increasingly more difficult levels. If you like logic games, this game will challenge you to think abstractly and predict outcomes. The ability to slow down the game and speed up, allows the player time to analyze and rework their plan until succeeding.

The goal of the game is to get the train(s) from point A to point B. In order to accomplish this, you must lay the railroad track in between the two points. The next level of difficulty involves multiple colored trains where each train must go to the color correct station. Eventually you will need to cross tracks to mix colors and even merge trains to make sure the trains arrive at the same time at the correct colored station.

Ultimately is a fun game that makes you think and can be played anytime without having to commit any length of time.

I want SO BADLY to rate this 5 stars, but I keep experiencing glitches that occur after like 30 or so puzzles that completely hinders me from being able to continue or back out. I have to force close the app to resolve it and then manually navigate to the next puzzle. This was one of my favorite games about 5 or six years ago and I was so excited to have remembered the name to redownload it. I have tried deleting and reinstalling to no avail. I have only lost my progress. I am not even sure if anyone operates on this game anymore, but as I just paid for the Express version, I would really appreciate it if it worked.

title.label: Are you ever going to fix the bug in this game?

content.label: Terrible app support. Fix the issue with buttons freezing.

What? No journey features? I just beat the game on Trainyard EX, after reading some websites I was excited to buy the full version to get faster trains so my phone doesn't have to be left on for days to see how long the journey I could create for my train. I estimated that I could get the train to travel well over 1 million, but the paid version eliminates the journey tracking entirely and the train is still super slow.  Don't give me wrong, I love the game – – brilliant! A very big challenge to beat all of the levels, but I was just trying to take the game a little further. Thanks for your amazing work on this cool little game.

It's good, I enjoy it to pass the time and to see if I can figure out the difficult puzzles. But sometimes when I solve a level it will give you the option to go to the next unsolved puzzle and the buttons just stopped working. I have to exit the game and wait a few hours even days before it works again. Please fix or tell me how to

I downloaded this game today. I have had it for so little time that Apple hasn't sent me the receipt yet.  Initially I was very happy with the game.  The tutorial is actually helpful.  The game is challenging. And just after the end of the tutorial, the game started crashing. It won't let me go on, it won't let me go back.   If I shut down the game and reopen it, I can play one board and then I'm back to the same problem. I was looking forward to a new game.  This won't be it.
The game is fun and difficult. No problems or anything but some updates will be nice

I have installed the free and purchased version. I can play for awhile everything is great. Then it freezes up after a puzzle is solved. Have to go out of game close  it on my phone and go back to the puzzle I just solved and hit the back button in the upper left corner to move on to the next puzzle. This happens on both versions.
Great and easy to play game

As a railroad employee, I try to avoid train themed games but this one was good. I'd definitely recommend it. The only issue I had was the menu buttons that appeared after completing a puzzle would stop working after getting pretty far in the game. You can get around this by closing the app then choosing the next puzzle from the main menu but it is an irritation.

Intriging game, requires some logical thought to determine some of the solutions.  Too bad it's buggy.  Right now, the game will not respond to any button on the "Solved" screen, forcing one to quit the app and restart it in order to continue to the next puzzle.  Awkward to say the least.
A logic puzzle to pass the time and keep the mind active

I hardly ever come here just to write a review but this game is really really cool. Super entertaining and smart. It freezes every time I solve a puzzle on the iPad pro tho... So I always have to close the game and reopen it.
Good game,except for one thing.When ever I complete a level,it won't let me hit next or any of the other buttons.It is really annoying 😡.Please fix.
Good game, freezes when it gets to the "You Solved It" Screen.
I like the game, but it froze permanently on about the 14th puzzle. I reset the phone and did everything's and it just would never work after that.
Love the game as this is my 2ndtime playing it but now it will not advance to the next puzzle.  Very frustrating as my goal is to complete all of the puzzles.

I thinks it a great game but every time I get to New Brunswick level I complete the first puzzle and the game won't let me move onto the next level. I click next and it does nothing. Don't want to constantly start game over to get to next level.
Very challenging levels although it freezes up after every level on my iPhone 5
Got three level in and locks up after every completed puzzle
Fun game....can not go wrong with trains.
It's great and the ios 3 requirement means that I can pick up my iPhone 1 or my iPod touch 1 and play like I'm on my iPhone 6s
Great test of logic
Great game, worked well and then kept freezing on an iPhone 6. Seems like an overdue update is required as most reviews are from several years ago
This game is unique and fun and has trains, it's my favorite iPod app yet.

This is a good game. I find that I can't put it down some times. I would say it's a great game, but I've really been having some issues. 
     I can't hit the "Next Button" after I pass a level. At first I thought it was my screen, but I've tested it, and it works fine on other apps. I think this game is perfect for the gamer that loves puzzles. 

Keep the games coming.

title.label: Great game but freezes after every level.

content.label: Needs a fix quick.
This the most fun app I've ever used.  Highly recommend it!
It's a great game but keeps freezing every time I complete a puzzle
It would be a great game if it didn't keep locking up.

I really like the game it's challenging to the mind. 
I have had to restart my phone 4 times and the app is freezing on me and will not take me to the next level.
Lots of solutions to each level. It's a simple concept, all of the difficulty is in the execution.
Very addictive!!!
This is a great game with fun and rewarding puzzle mechanics.  Definitely worth downloading
This is a fun game continues to challenge as you go on, but it has some issues with screens freezing up.
I really liked this game a lot...until I completed a level and it quit working. It's stuck on a message that says my route was successful and nothing I do let's me move to the next level
Locks up after solving a puzzle.
Relaxing but challenging
Love it!
Nice, unhurried puzzles to test your brain without lots of flashiness. Relaxing fun. Good for both young and old, with well-written tutorials explaining how things work.

Very fun puzzles, nice level variations, smooth interface and graphics. Unfortunately, the game often freezes up after I finish a level, keeping me from moving on. It does save my progress, but it's annoying. 5 stars once that's fixed!
This is a great game but it keeps freezing on various levels and you have to reset the phone to fix it and skip that level
Awesome logic game! My whole family is hooked.
Such a great game. Will always love this one.

title.label: Update for new OS and new iPhones!!

content.label: Update to optimise for bigger iPhones!!!!!
At iOS 9.0.2: Am enjoying the puzzles (to Ontario), but the screen locks up after every successful solution. Have to exit, start again, then do Back to get to Next puzzle.
Nice logic puzzle game too simple at first but gradually becomes more challenging
